plot: When she saw Francois Truffaut's Day For Night, Angelique discovered that it was possible to dream up her life.
title: La nuit américaine d'Angélique
plot_es: When she saw Francois Truffaut's Day For Night, Angelique discovered that it was possible to dream up her life.
plot_en: When she saw Francois Truffaut's Day For Night, Angelique discovered that it was possible to dream up her life.
